text: A bay is a large body of water. It is in the land next to a sea or lake between two headlands. Canada is bordered by the Atlantic Ocean, Pacific Ocean, and Arctic Ocean. There are also hundreds of lakes larger than 100 km2 (38.6 sqsecond largest country by area. All of these factors mean that Canada has hundreds Some of the large bays in Canada are: *Baffin Bay *Hudson Bay *James Bay ==Related pages== *List of Canadian Bay articles on this Wikipedia * Category:Canada geography-related lists
title: Bays of Canada
